tool_description: Tracks and analyzes historical performance data including audience reactions, material success rates, and venue-specific outcomes.

venue_filter.description: Filter results by specific venue name

error_messages: Invalid comedian ID: The specified comedian_id was not found in the performance database.
Invalid date range: date_range_start must be earlier than date_range_end, and both must be in YYYY-MM-DD format.
No performance data: No performances found matching the specified filters.
Venue not found: The specified venue_filter does not match any venues in the performance history.
usage: Provide comedian_id to retrieve performance history. Use optional filters to narrow analysis by venue, date range, or material category.

total_performances.description: Number of performances in the filtered dataset

successful_materials.description: List of consistently well-received material titles
